name: Project Zomboid Server
long_description: You may need to exec into the container to initialize the server, as it will prompt for an administrator password on the first startup.
cmds: docker run -d --name ${name} -p ${portmap_16261}:16261/tcp -p ${portmap_16262}:16262/tcp -p ${portmap_16261}:16261/udp -p ${portmap_16262}:16262/udp -v ${name}-data:/root --entrypoint /bin/bash steamcmd/steamcmd -c "apt update; apt install -y tmux; steamcmd +force_install_dir /root +login anonymous +app_update 380870 validate +quit; tmux new -d -s pzomboid /root/start-server.sh; tail -f /dev/null"
